subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Josh Thole, who hit .321 in 17 games for the Mets in September and then flirted with .400 in the Venezuelan winter league, has shown the mettle and determination to succeed anywhere.
snippet: Josh Thole, who hit .321 in 17 games for the Mets in September and then flirted with .400 in the Venezuelan winter league, has shown the mettle and determination to succeed anywhere.
